body_html:
@colesbury @SsnL I wanted to ping this to see if this is on anyone's radar.

I've found some workarounds using numba or cupy in the meantime, but unfortunately those workarounds force me to stay on a single GPU (the 0-th index only, in fact). Otherwise, I get mismatched devices.

body:
@colesbury @SsnL I wanted to ping this to see if this is on anyone's radar. 

I've found some workarounds using numba or cupy in the meantime, but unfortunately those workarounds force me to stay on a single GPU (the 0-th index only, in fact). Otherwise, I get mismatched devices.
